TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GroupBox extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示一个 Windows 控件，该控件显示围绕一组具有可选标题的控件的框架。

span.span: Represents a Windows control that displays a frame around a group of controls with an optional caption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示围绕一组控件与或无标题的框架。The displays a frame around a group of controls with or without a caption. 使用以进行逻辑分组的窗体上的控件的集合。Use a to logically group a collection of controls on a form. 分组框是可以用于定义控件组的一个容器控件。The group box is a container control that can be used to define groups of controls. 分组框的典型用途是包含的逻辑组控件。The typical use for a group box is to contain a logical group of controls. 如果你有两个组框中，其中每个包含多个选项按钮 （也称为单选按钮），按钮的每个组是每个组的互相排斥，则设置一个选项值。If you have two group boxes, each of which contain several option buttons (also known as radio buttons), each group of buttons is mutually exclusive, setting one option value per group. 你可以将控件添加到使用方法属性。You can add controls to the by using the method of the property. > [!NOTE] > 中包含的控件控件可以选择或接收焦点。Only controls that are contained within the control can be selected or receive focus. 完整本身不能同时选择或接收焦点。The complete itself cannot be selected or receive focus. 有关此控件如何响应的详细信息和方法，请参阅以下成员： ， ， ， ， ， .For more information about how this control responds to the and methods, see the following members: , , , , , . 无法显示滚动条。The cannot display a scroll bar. 如果你需要一个控件类似于，可以包含滚动条，请参阅控件。If you need a control similar to a that can contain a scroll bar, see the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实例化并创建和两个控件。The following code example instantiates and creates a and two controls. 单选按钮添加到组框和组框中添加到。The radio buttons are added to the group box and the group box is added to the . [!code-csharp[Classic GroupBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic GroupBox Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic GroupBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic GroupBox Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，属性设置为`false`新创建。By default, the property is set to `false` when a new is created. 组中有 100 个像素的初始高度和宽度的 200 像素。The group box has an initial height of 100 pixels and width of 200 pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实例化并创建和两个控件。The following code example instantiates and creates a and two controls. （也称为单选按钮） 中的选项按钮添加到组框中，并且组框添加到。The option buttons (also known as radio buttons) are added to the group box, and the group box is added to the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`GroupBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `GroupBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#406](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#406)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#406](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#406)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件为顶级，则此方法将不缩放控件的位置。If the control is top level, this method will not scale the control's location. 此方法不缩放子控件或自动调整大小的控件的大小。This method does not scale children or the size of automatically sized controls. 你可以忽略任何方向的缩放通过更改的值`specified`参数。You can omit scaling in any direction by changing the value of the `specified` parameter.

span.span: to allow the user to press the TAB key to give the focus to the ; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCompatibleTextRendering { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是使用 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 还是 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 呈现文本

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text

value.span: 如果应使用类来执行兼容版本 1.0 和 1.1 文本呈现。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性旨在提供 visual Windows 窗体控件之间的兼容性，呈现文本使用类和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]应用程序执行自定义文本呈现使用类。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大多数情况下，如果你的应用程序不正在升级从[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，因此，建议你停`UseCompatibleTextRendering`设置的默认值为`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基于类中引入了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]为了提高性能，使文本效果更好，并提高的国际字体支持。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在早期版本的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基于类用于执行所有文本呈现。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 计算字符间距和自动换行从的不同[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。 calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 在 Windows 窗体应用程序中使用类呈现文本中，这可能会导致使用的控件的文本显示不同于应用程序中的其他文本。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解决此不兼容性，你可以设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性`true`对特定的控件。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`到`true`应用程序中的所有受支持控件，调用方法的参数替换`true`。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.
